meanings.definition: A fermented dairy drink traditionally made from mare's milk.
meanings.sent1: I tried koumiss for the first time at the farm.
meanings.sent2: The nomads enjoyed koumiss as a refreshing beverage.
meanings.sent3: The koumiss was so bubbly, it tickled my nose!
meanings.sent4: The koumiss flowed like a river of creamy goodness.
meanings.sent5: The tangy taste of koumiss lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: She learned how to koumiss from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: We gathered around the fire to koumiss together.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to koumiss before the guests arrive!
meanings.sent4: He koumissed the whole bottle in one go.
meanings.sent5: The village celebrated by koumissing all night long.
